resources.string: There was an error initializing the YouTubePlayer (%1$s)
If you walk up to any machine at this GYM I can give you some tips on how to work out properly.
This app will generate notifications about the region state even if the app is killed. The app will also auto-launch in the background on boot.

Stretch and warm up. Place your feet no more than shoulder-width apart. Point toes slightly outward. Place bar over your trapezius muscle, not your neck. Grab bar about 6 inches from shoulders. Dismount weight and step forward (or backward depending on setup). Keeping your back straight, bend at your knees as if you were sitting into a chair. Keep your heels on the floor. Bring your thighs parallel to the floor for full range of motion. Thrust your hips forward, keep your lower back in a neutral position(slightly arched) and abs in. Use your whole body to assist in lifting the weight.

Stretch and warm up. Keep your feet flat on the ground, about shoulder width apart, and keep your shoulders touching the bench. Use a wide grip for emphasis on pectoral muscles, narrow grip for emphasis on triceps, and normal grip(slightly more than shoulder width) for a balance of both. Do not bend your wrists or bounce the bar off your chest. Dismount the bar and control the weight until it is slightly above your sternum. Then, with control, explode the bar up. That is one repetition.
